about_the_game:
Whether you’re looking for a solo experience or to team up with friends and family, an unforgettable adventure awaits in Infinity Knights: Xross! Lovingly developed by three brothers, this multiplayer RPG immerses players in a lush fantasy world filled with rich lore and challenges. Form strong bonds and band together with allies to take on epic quests, craft powerful items, and challenge colossal bosses, where teamwork is your greatest weapon!

The Armament System allows for finely tuned adaptive combat, enabling players to switch between elements and weapons mid-combo. Sync with allies to combine attacks and customize special abilities and boosts. The Kingdom’s most challenging trials and bosses await those who choose to master the art of combat!

Experience the tales of a King and his Infinity Knights who bravely fight to maintain peace with The Armaments - ethereal weapons that allow King Brandt to revive those they have slain. Xross, the newest Infinity Knight, will embark on a life-changing adventure as he is confronted by both the thrill and dark reality of what it means to be eternal.

Xross, the newest Infinity Knight, will embark on a life-changing adventure as he experiences both the thrill and dark reality of what it means to be eternal.
